{{< entity_summary >}}
The Government of Canada spent an estimated **\$15.7K in 2021-2022** on contracts with GEORGE COUREY.

Across 12 contracts active since the start of the 2017-2018 fiscal year, 2 have at least one amendment (17%). Of contracts with amendments, the average increase in dollar value was 6% and the average number of amendments was 1.5. Cumulatively these amendments represent an increase of \$5.5K over the original contract values.

The average contract duration was 0.22 years, and the average contract value (not including contracts under \$10k) was \$3.3M. The longest contract was 0.73 years. The largest contract by value (including amendments) was \$39.7M.

{{< /entity_summary >}}
